markdown:
<title level="1" right="Setting Article" pfs="">[Kovlar](/Articles.aspx?ID=5)</title>

**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 58

This onetime district of the larger city of Saggorak has been reclaimed by the living, but life in Kovlar is anything but safe!
